# Custom MediaWiki Dockerfile with Mermaid extension
FROM mediawiki:1.39

# Install required packages for extension installation
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y \
    git \
    unzip \
    wget \
    libpq-dev \
    && docker-php-ext-install pgsql \
    && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

# Install Mermaid extension using wget and unzip
RUN cd /var/www/html/extensions \
    && wget -O mermaid.zip https://github.com/6cdh/SimpleMermaid/archive/refs/heads/main.zip \
    && unzip mermaid.zip \
    && mv SimpleMermaid-main Mermaid \
    && rm mermaid.zip

# Set proper permissions
RUN chown -R www-data:www-data /var/www/html/extensions/Mermaid

# Copy custom LocalSettings.php if it exists
# COPY LocalSettings.php /var/www/html/LocalSettings.php

# Expose port 80
EXPOSE 80

# Start Apache
CMD ["apache2-foreground"]
